Public Remarks: A gorgeous detached townhome, adjacent to Garry Point Park, and a short stroll to Steveston's waterfront shops and dining spots! So many features to list including in-floor radiant hot water heat on both levels, engineered hardwood floors & crown moulding, a fieldstone gas fire place - a spacious kitchen with stainless steel appliances and granite counters - master bedroom has large ensuite and a walkout deck.  There are plenty of windows offering lots of natural light, & all rooms have water views.  Enjoy the sunsets and relax on the large wrap around deck. Stroll across the street to scenic Gary Point Park, or walk along the water to shopping or dinner in Steveston Village.  These homes are rarely offered for sale.  This is a unique opportunity to enjoy the Steveston Waterfront Lifestyle

Main floor has a full bathroom & a den as well. Beautiful big backyard with covered patio. 2+1 unauth. suites in the bsmt. Centrally located in a family oriented area. The open kitchen & living area opens on to huge sun-drenched decks that wrap around the main living space, separate dining room, top floor master suite as well as multiple rooms for an art studio/den/office. Separate workshop, lots of storage & plenty of parking. Head out on the boat, jump in the kayak, swim off the dock. A fabulous low-maintenance place for recreation or full time living.
